nodes.text: The Zarracines, the native species of the planet Zarracina III, were governed by a ruling council. In 11,660 BBY, the Galactic Republic, which was under the control of the speciesist Pius Dea cult at the time, attempted to capture Zarracina III. To avoid being converted to the Pius Dea religion and to spite the Republic, the entire ruling council committed suicide.
